sermons.title: Stopping the Power of Darkness
sermons.description: Ravenhill gives an account of John Sung at the very end of this message. The testimony covers his academic success and then utter transformation upon conversion and filling of the Spirit. This message covers getting alone being still to hear God and what total consecration looks like. Spoken in the eve of abortion's legalization in Hawaii, he calls for people to walk in the measure of faith they been given with illustration from the testimony of Rees Howell purchasing the Bible school property.
